name: Galactic Blasters D - Future Darkness [The Trial]
name_original: Galactic Blasters D - Future Darkness [The Trial]
description:
This is The Trial version of the next Galactic Blasters game, Galactic Blasters D - Future Darkness. As such, this version of the game does not represent what the final product may be.

Galactic Blasters D - Future Darkness is the 4th Galactic Blasters game.

It's a horizontal space shooter game that takes place in 2046 alongside Galactic Blasters ++ - Kuipic Sniper, in which the player has to uncover the secrets of Codename: STEP in a 7-Stage Story Mode (although only Stages 1-4 are available in The Trial). There's also a Classic Mode, in which the player faces an endless fleet of enemy spaceships, much like the previous Galactic Blasters games. And if you feel like playing with a friend, then you can uncover the secrets of Codename: STEP together (although Multiplayer Story Mode isn't in The Trial), or battle against each other.
